rules_text:
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. You lose 2 life.
[i]Augmented[/i] – Then if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
flavor_text:
[i]“It all keeps adding up...I think I'm cracking up.”
—Oscar Jones, AOSE explorer[/i]
